summary: Build a professional, modern eBook sales website named “Suman Gowda Tech e-Book Publications” (white + blue theme), including storefront for digital PDF eBooks, India-friendly payments (Razorpay/Stripe), admin sales dashboard, content pages (About/Contact/Legal), SEO, newsletter capture, and social links. Email automation is not required; business email is manually set in admin and displayed on Contact page; contact form submissions are stored/viewable in the admin dashboard.
architectural_notes: Avoid automated email sending; store contact form submissions in admin dashboard and allow manual business email setting displayed publicly on Contact page.
known_issues: Initial build generation failed previously ("AI was unable to fulfill your request"); retry requested.
User reports admin panel shows "Access denied" and cannot find payment/upload options; user requested rebuilding the website again from the beginning.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive, clean, professional website for “Suman Gowda Tech e-Book Publications” using a white + blue theme, including a global header that supports uploading a brand profile picture/logo and displaying it in the header across pages.

Implement the Home page with: (1) hero section showing brand name and the tagline “Simple Tech Learning for Real Jobs”, (2) CTA buttons “Explore eBooks” and “Buy Now”, and (3) a short description of the brand and mission.
Implement a Store / Products page that lists multiple eBooks with cover image, title, description, price, and a Buy button for each product.
Implement admin product management to create/update/delete eBooks and upload associated assets, including: (1) cover image upload and (2) digital PDF upload for each eBook product.
Add an Admin Panel (protected by Internet Identity login) with a dashboard showing: total sales, total revenue, number of customers, and an order history list.
Implement a payment and purchase flow using Stripe (test mode supported) to sell digital eBooks, and enable automatic in-app digital delivery after successful payment (no email sending).
Implement download tracking: record each successful download/access event per order and expose download counts/events in the admin order details.

Add an admin setting to manually enter and update the business email address (default to sumangowdatechpublications@gmail.com), and display the currently configured business email on the Contact Us page.

Implement a Contact Us page that shows the business email and a simple contact form (Name, Email, Message) where submissions are stored in the backend and viewable inside the admin dashboard (no email sending).
Implement About page content featuring founder “Suman Gowda” and a short story about building practical tech resources for real jobs.
Implement Legal pages: Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy, each accessible from the site footer (or equivalent consistent location).
Add newsletter email capture UI and backend storage (collection only; no email sending). Include an admin view to export the captured email list.

Add social links (Instagram, Telegram, LinkedIn) in a consistent site location (e.g., footer). Provide admin-editable URLs or clearly defined placeholders that can be updated later without code changes.
Make pages SEO-ready by adding per-page titles and meta descriptions for Home, Store, About, Contact, and Legal pages.

Improve the Admin Panel 'Access Denied' experience to guide the user to the correct Internet Identity and/or complete first-time admin setup, instead of leaving them stuck on the Access Denied screen.
Add an Admin Settings capability to manage admin access after bootstrap by allowing an existing admin to grant admin permission to additional principals (so the owner can avoid future lockouts).

Ensure the rebuilt-from-scratch flow preserves all existing site functionality (storefront, payments, product upload, downloads, contact/newsletter/admin dashboard) while focusing changes only on admin access/setup reliability.

Home page with hero (brand name + tagline “Simple Tech Learning for Real Jobs”), CTAs (Explore eBooks/Buy Now), and brand mission section
Store/Products page: list multiple eBooks with cover image, title, description, price, and Buy button

Payments & sales system with India-friendly options (UPI/cards/netbanking) via Razorpay or Stripe integration
Admin sales dashboard: total sales, revenue, customers, order history, download tracking, and customer email list export
Admin setting to manually enter business email address and display it on the Contact Us page
Contact Us page: show business email and provide contact form (Name, Email, Message) with submissions viewable inside admin dashboard (no email sending)
About page content featuring founder Suman Gowda and mission/story
Legal pages: Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, Refund Policy
SEO optimized pages, newsletter email capture (storage only), and social links (Instagram, Telegram, LinkedIn)

Add a backend-supported first-time admin bootstrap mechanism so the website can be rebuilt/used from scratch even when no admin principal is configured (to prevent the Admin Panel from permanently showing 'Access Denied').
